A brilliant, dense and conductive metal.

components.name: Morphics
components.description:
An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.
Locations: Mercury, Mars, Phobos, Europa, and Pluto.

components.name: Oxium
components.description:
Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.
Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Azurite
description:
A blue gem layered with impurities.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pyrol and Azurite being rarer than intended and Coprun and Devar being more likely than intended. They should now be equally as likely.

name: Cerulean Fungus Extract
description: Extracted from a Cerulean Fungus colony.

name: Cetus Wisp
description:
Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23
patchlogs.changes: Moved Cetus Wisp and Maprico Tree spawn points a bit further away from water volumes in the NW corner of the Plains for gathering ease.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.changes: Quill Onkko has added a Cetus Wisp to his Offerings in Cetus. These can be purchased with Quill Standing for Architect level Tenno.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.changes: A special UI message is now displayed when picking up a Syndicate Medallion or Cetus Wisp (similar to Argon Crystal).

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.4
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Cetus Wisp will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Ghoul Bounty tables have received new items including Nitain, Cetus Wisps, and Breath of the Eidolon!

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: More than doubled the size of the Cetus Wisp pickup radius. This will allow you to obtain the Cetus Wisp from further away instead of needing to be right on top of it.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Cetus Wisps being updated while the game was paused -

name: Condroc Wing
description:
The talon on a condroc's wing is sharp enough to tear through bone.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

name: Corpus Cipher

patchlogs.name: Update 9.6
patchlogs.changes: Enabled selling of Corpus Ciphers and Data Masses.

name: Corpus Datamass
description: A Corpus datamass containing encrypted intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

name: Detonite Ampule
description:
Researching the Detonite traces within could advance our weapon technology.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Picking up a Syndicate Medallion, Exceptional Sentient Core, or Flawless Sentient Core will now display the same special UI message like when you pick up an Argon Crystal.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.additions: Added a reusable Blueprint for converting Intact Sentient Cores to Exceptional Sentient Cores. This Blueprint is available from Onkko in Cetus. This is an addition to help provide an alternative, but still invested, way for players to progress in the Quills.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Increased Exceptional Sentient Cores from 400 Standing to 500 Standing.

patchlogs.changes: Detonite/Fieldron rewards from Invasion missions will now always be a bundle of 3.

patchlogs.changes: Fieldron Sample replaced with Fieldron

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Increased Outbreak rewards on ‘Hard’ Planets: Doubled the offered rewards (i.e 2x Fieldron, etc).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where the Dual Cestra project can be started before you ever start the Fieldron research. Every other item in the energy lab has prior requirements except for Dual Cestras.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.changes: The Quills Standing increases (Flawless Sentient Cores remains the same for now):

name: Frostleaf
description: This resilient plant provides a natural food source in frigid areas of the Origin system.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with scanning the Frostleaf plant.

name: Grokdrul
description:
A noxious mix of polysaccharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier's Looter precept not working for some Plains resources like Grokdrul containers.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: The 2x Neurodes Sacrifice to Collaborator has been replaced with 10x Grokdrul.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Grokdrul and Iradite pickups from crates and caches with Rubedo and Ferrite in the Plains to better expose the deeper Resource system.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.additions: Added a reusable Blueprint for converting Intact Sentient Cores to Exceptional Sentient Cores. This Blueprint is available from Onkko in Cetus. This is an addition to help provide an alternative, but still invested, way for players to progress in the Quills.
patchlogs.changes: Increased the drop chance of Intact Sentient Cores from Vomvalysts to 100%.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Increased Intact Sentient Cores from 25 Standing to 100 Standing.

name: Iradite

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced Grokdrul and Iradite pickups from crates and caches with Rubedo and Ferrite in the Plains to better expose the deeper Resource system.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
patchlogs.changes: 100 Iradite to 50 Iradite
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to waypoint Iradite, Grokdul, or Maprico Trees in the Plains.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the positioning, size, and hit radius of the Iradite Resource in the Plains.
